description: Dashboard for Micrometer instrumented applications (Java, Spring Boot, Micronaut)

targets.expr: sum by (job)(jvm_memory_used_bytes{application="$application", instance="$instance", area="heap"})*100/sum by (job)(jvm_memory_max_bytes{application="$application",instance="$instance", area="heap"})

sum by (job)(jvm_memory_used_bytes{application="$application", instance="$instance", area="nonheap"})*100/sum by (job)(jvm_memory_max_bytes{application="$application",instance="$instance", area="nonheap"})

targets.legendFormat: 초당 HTTP 요청 수({{ job }} - {{ routeId }})

panels.title: 느린 요청 단위시간 당 발생 여부

targets.expr: sum by (job)(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{application="$application", instance="$instance", status!~"5.."}[1m]))/sum by (job)(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", status!~"5.."}[1m]))

targets.rawSql:
select
  cast(DATE_FORMAT(timestmp, '%H') AS UNSIGNED ) AS "시(H)",
  trace_id as "추적ID",
  (execute_result*1) as "소요시간(ms)",
  timestmp as  "타임스탬프",
  caller_class as "호출",
  caller_method as "호출상세"
from db2.logging_event
where
  logger_name = "TRACE"
  and execute_result is not null
  and timestmp > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY)
  and caller_method IN ("GET", "POST", "PUT", "DELETE")
order by timestmp desc;

select
  cast(DATE_FORMAT(timestmp, '%H') AS UNSIGNED ) AS "시(H)",
  trace_id as "추적ID",
  (execute_result*1) as "소요시간(ms)",
  timestmp as  "타임스탬프",
  caller_class as "호출",
  caller_method as "호출상세"
from db2.logging_event
where
  logger_name = "TRACE"
  and execute_result is not null
  and timestmp > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY)
  and caller_class = "SQL"
order by timestmp desc;

SELECT
  timestmp AS "시간",
  trace_id AS "추적ID",
  caller_class AS "호출",
  caller_method AS "호출상세",
  execute_result AS "결과"
from db2.logging_slow
order by timestmp desc;

SELECT
  timestmp AS "시간",
  trace_id AS "추적ID",
  caller_class AS "호출",
  caller_method AS "호출상세",
  execute_result AS "결과"
from db2.logging_error
order by timestmp desc;

SELECT
  timestmp AS "시간",
  trace_id AS "추적ID",
  caller_class AS "호출",
  caller_method AS "호출상세",
  logger_name AS "종류",
  execute_result AS "결과"
FROM db2.logging_event
ORDER BY timestmp desc
LIMIT 50

title: 어플리케이션 모니터링
